Your Critical Hit attacks and Critical Heals give you 2 Energy.

Rank.Description: Your Critical Hit attacks and Critical Heals increase your damage and healing done by 2% for 10 seconds.

Your Critical Hit attacks and Critical Heals increase your damage and healing done by 6% for 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Restores 64 health to up to 10 party or raid members when Empyrean Bolt or Restorative Bolt is executed. Only 1 Engine can be activated at a time.

Whenever you use a Torrent, you gain a stacking buff that causes your next Tactician Combo Point generating ability to add an additional Combo Point. Stacks up to 2 times.
Whenever you use a Torrent, you gain a stacking buff that causes your next Tactician Combo Point generating ability to add an additional Combo Point. Stacks up to 4 times.
Necrotic Torrent deals 40% more damage if the target's Health is below 30%.
Necrotic Torrent deals 60% more damage if the target's Health is below 30%.

Ability.Description: Deals 1095 to 1210 Fire damage to up to 8 enemies between the Rogue and the target over 15s.
Restores 221 to 245 health party or raid members in front of you over 3s. This effect can heal up to 2 additional party or raid members. Reduces Energy by 1 for every second of channel.

Increases healing done by 10%.
Increases healing done by 15%.
Increases healing done by 20%.
Increases healing done by 25%.

Glacial Torrent applies up to 7 stacks of Glacial Chill to affected enemies, causing them to take 10% more damage per stack from Infernal Torrent. Infernal Torrent consumes 1 stack of Glacial Chill per tick.
Tactician Finishers increase damage and healing done by 10%. Lasts 30s.

AbilityRank.Description: Rays can be cast instantly with no cost, but their damage is reduced by 30%. Curative Blast has no cost, but its healing is reduced by 30%. Rays and Curative Blast restores 3 Energy per Combo Point spent.
